#include<cstdio>
int t,k,i,j,k1,obrk,k2;
int main()
{
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for (i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&k);
        while (true)
        {
            k++;
            k2=k;
            while (k2>0)
            {
                obrk=obrk*10;
                k1=k2%10;
                obrk=obrk+k1;
                k2=k2/10;
            }
            if (k==obrk)
            {
                printf("%d\n",k);
                obrk=0;
                break;
            }
            else
                obrk=0;
        }
    }
return 0;
}
